item.description:
For March Brunch, we'll visit Colonel Blackinton Inn in Attleboro.

Here's their website :  http://www.colblackintoninn.com/menu-brunch.html

This is a brand new brunch menu for them (it starts on 2/17) and it looks great.

In addition to the menu they offer an omelet and waffle station for 16.95 per person.  It has omelets, waffles, yogurt, fresh fruit, quiche, fresh muffins, bacon, sausage, homes fries, and other additions the chef changes weekly. 

I'm looking forward to brunching at Blackinton Inn. 

Unfortunately, I have to limit the group to 12 people.  That's the largest table they have in the dining area.  

I hope to see you there
item.how_to_find_us: I have made a reservation for our group
item.name: March Brunch - Colonel Blackinton Inn in Attleboro
